title: AdiIRC portable irc client
description:
<a href="http://www.adiirc.com/index.php" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.adiirc.com/index.php</a>

A small, fast application designed to be a powerful IRC client

AdiRC is a handy and useful application designed to help you easily connect to a channel / server and start chating with your friends. AdiRC is a small and fast application designed to be a powerful IRC client.

AdiIRC stores all its settings in text files, this way you can grab the adiirc folder and put in on a usb device or external harddrive. Take all your settings and servers with you everywhere!

Here are some key features of "AdiIRC":

Ã‚Â· Written in C# to be flexible and to implement neat features fast
Ã‚Â· Threaded multiserver support
Ã‚Â· Full DCC Send/Get support
Ã‚Â· Sysinfo, like cpu,gfx,hd,mem,uptime etc
Ã‚Â· Winamp support, play,pause,stop,next,prev,playlist search buttons and commands
Ã‚Â· Fullscreen and opacity options
Ã‚Â· Rawlog output window
Ã‚Â· Channels/private windows logging
Ã‚Â· Customizable colors (inc mIRC colors)
Ã‚Â· Runs on all versions of Windows and out of the box in Windows Vista
Ã‚Â· Basic Identd features
Ã‚Â· Clean but customizable User Interface
Ã‚Â· Does not need an installer, everything stored in textfiles
Ã‚Â· Can update itself
Ã‚Â· Transparent background images
Ã‚Â· Away system
Ã‚Â· Channel text search panel (ctrl + f)
